meanings.definition: The greatest quantity or value possible.
meanings.sent1: I ate the max amount of cookies allowed.
meanings.sent2: The max speed limit on this road is 55 miles per hour.
meanings.sent3: I reached my max limit of patience waiting in line.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was at the max level.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was at its max during the surprise party.

meanings.sent1: Let's max out our efforts to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: I always try to max my score in every game I play.
meanings.sent3: I will max my energy to complete the marathon.
meanings.sent4: She managed to max her savings by the end of the year.
meanings.sent5: The athlete trained hard to max his performance at the competition.

meanings.definition: A person's full potential or capacity.
meanings.sent1: She believed she could reach her max in her career.
meanings.sent2: He pushed himself to the max to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent3: The student's determination was at its max during the exam.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was at the max when she painted the masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The team's collaboration was at its max during the successful project completion.
